title: High ping from Hong Kong 15 April

replies.body:
Hey there,

Your best bet for the latest information would be to contact your ISP.

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=EXNgJsP6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-16T23:06:12.344+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> Your best bet for the latest information would be to contact your ISP.

I contacted my ISP and after their investigation they confirmed it is the problem of ISP in OCE not Hong Kong. I also did a check and found the ping to "i-0-7-0-4.sydo-core01.bx.telstraglobal.net" is very high (IP address 202.84.143.21). Do you know why is that? Thank you.

Hey there,

I'll forward this information onto the live services team, thanks for the report.

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=EXNgJsP6,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-25T10:31:58.951+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> I'll forward this information onto our live services team, thanks for the report.

Thank you for the quick response!
Any updates about the lag? We are still lagging 250+ ping.

> [{quoted}](name=Bark Wahlberg,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=EXNgJsP6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-28T10:14:45.429+0000)
>
> Still having the same issue?

Yes, I just opened a custom game the ping was 255. I also did a WinMTR test and the ping was still 240ish when it reaches "i-0-1-0-2.sydo-core03.bx.telstraglobal.net", results are below.

Thanks for the MTR.  I passed this along to our engineers and unfortunately we can't influence the routing any further to improve the latency. Your only option at this point, aside from playing on a server physically closer to you, is to log the issue with your ISP.

I just had 2 games today and the first game has 131 ping, then in the middle of my second game the ping jumps to 217. Do you know what is going on? There may be 'nothing you can do', but I JUST WANT TO KNOW WHAT IS GOING ON. Please tell me what exactly the problem is, instead of 'nothing we can do on our side'. Because I want to know the reason for my high ping. Thanks.
Thanks for the reply. I have contacted my ISP and they said it is OCE side problem.....
Yes. Tried today, 214 ping. Can you give me an update about it? If the issue cannot be resolved, can you let me transfer to japan?
Tried another vs AI bot game, still 255 ping

Same situation, in Hong Kong, from ~140 ping to ~250ping.
I have this persistant lag since the end of March, I'm still logging in the check my ping every now and then.

Another interesting event I discovered, through speedtest.net on every server from Sydney, the latency has this pattern:
Every server other than Telstra still provide below 140ms ping
Only the speedtest on Telstra server has 210ms ping
[](http://www.speedtest.net/result/5300710090.png)

This issue (and speedtest result) has been persistant from the end of March till now.
Yes, My ISP is  PCCW netvigator
are you using 1000M broadband? Also tmy ping recently becomes 210ish, which is slightly better than before (still very lag tho). Are you experiencing the same?

I have been asking for help for a month and there is still no progress......good to know that this is probably OCE side server problem and not Hong Kong's side's problem. Hope riot is on the problem. Haven't heard from them for a week.
